caption.p:
TX95 estimates by midcentury (2046–2055) computed from different GCMs: ( a) ICHEC-EC-EARTH; ( b) NOAA-GFDL-GFDL-ESM2M; ( c) NCC-NorESM1-M; ( d) CCCma-CanESM2; ( e) IPSL-IPSL-CM5A-MR; ( f) MPI-M-MPI-ESM-LR; ( g) CSIRO-QCCCE-CSIRO-Mk3-6-0; ( h) MIROC-MIROC5; ( i) Standard deviation (STD) computed by using the spread of decadal TX95 estimates (2046–2055) from different GCMs (see plots a– h). Plots were generated by using Python’s Matplotlib Library
92 .
